description: Improving the Capacity of the NCCMD in developing and implementing startegies for management development of Iraqi Public Sector Institutions

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
1-  Staff capacity to mainstream gender in all programming activities built.
2- Gender audit completed and gender mainstreaming strategy complete with the result framework.
3- Gender team consisting of gender focal point reporting more than one unit established.
4- Documentation of the best and lessons learnt developed and shared.
5- Gender consideration mainstreamed within UNDP Iraq CO programme project
subproject.title: Constitutional Strengthening

title: Strengthening of the constitutional process
